roleset.name: remove obstacles
roleset.note: UNBLOCK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'unblock' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from unblock.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: someone tell wsj authors to stop making up words
example.text: In Honduras, where the Contras are a hot political issue, [he]-1 promised [*-1]to help unblock some $70 million in assistance withheld due to the failure of local agencies to comply with conditions agreed upon with Washington.
example.arg: some $70 million in assistance withheld due to the failure of local agencies to comply with conditions agreed upon with Washington
